name: for political lovers, a little utopia sketch
name_original: for political lovers, a little utopia sketch
description:
for political lovers... is a brief Twine poem-game about being with another person and being hopeful enough to get to a better place than where we started.

It was featured in Videogames for Humans, edited by merritt kopas and published by Instar Books, with a beautifully written playthrough by Avery Alder.
